about.paragraphWhoAmI: I have always been a curious individual, eager to understand how things work. When I discovered programming, I found a space where I could experiment, build, and continuously improve. I enjoy staying in motion, learning, and evolvingâ€”not just as a developer but also in how I approach challenges and collaborate with others to take ideas beyond the drawing board.
about.paragraphWhatILove: What I enjoy most about development is the ability to transform an idea into something functional and impactful. I am motivated by tackling challenges, analyzing problems, and finding solutions that truly make a difference. Beyond the code, I care deeply about how every decision impacts scalability, performance, and user experience. I love experimenting with new technologies and methodologies to enhance the way I build software, always striving to learn and refine my craft.

myfinance.title: MyFinance
myfinance.description:
MyFinance is a personal finance management app I built to help users track expenses, set budgets, and visualize their financial health with interactive charts.
This project demonstrates my ability to create practical, real-world solutions with modern tools and a focus on user experience.
